body: Kelvin reacts to news about the hacking of the Kenyan police website: "So, yeah. The Kenya police website was broken into. Twice. In a time-frame of a few days. It makes me wonder whether the boys in blue really do take cyber security seriously. This time the hacker even exposed the admin password for the Kenya Police website."

title: Kenya: Kenya Police Website Hacked
